When do people learn??

You should ALWAYS strip the extras and DTS sound when converting DVD 9  to DVD 5. If extras is important, just add them to a seperate disc.

To the people who wants the extras and DTS on the same disc (DVD 5), please download avi's, because you don't care about quality!!

Could anyone else upload a QUALITY version of this movie (no extras or DTS)?

Lol DTS and the extra features is on the movie from the beginning .. so why remove it ? the quality is not getting better if i remove the DTS and the extras .. what have DTS and the extra features with the quality to do ?

Jontey,

It does make a difference to remove DTS and extra features, since that will leave more room on the disc for a higher quality main feature and soundtrack.  It's already a compromise to convert a DVD9 to a DVD5, so you want to maximize space for the main title.
I watched this one yesterday.  It was no problem with it. Good sound, and good picture quality.  Well worth downloading. Thanks Jontey!
